item.description:
Rain or shine!
Chance of rain for this event is 1 in 3. Therefore,

Rain or excess chill location= NOIR BAR, at the lower main entrance of the Charles Hotel-- right next to the patio! If we aren't there at the patio, thats where to find us!
http://www.noir-bar.com/

Bring an extra shirt! (assuming we can stay at the outdoor patio). Temp predicted at 65 degrees but there is early shade. Bring cash & please pay on the spot, (no tabs) in case we have to move quickly (weather).

This will be our last outdoor snob meetup. Sundown is at 7 PM.

Welcome to Chap XVIII of this Nerd Fun snob endeavor, in the heart of intellectual snobbery, Harvard Sq. Be there or be Sq.

Legal Sea Foods=LOWER patio in front of main entrance of Charles Hotel.

Machines! Wasn't there the promise they would give us more liberty & allow us more free time, even: shorten our work week.

Now we have the car... the computer... have we become dependent on it? What about oil, where do we get it? Is this progress? 

Here is a very popular youtube link with a rendering of the Futurist Manifesto with their vision of the future (1909)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HY8kVa0qB9Q

You don't have to be a genuine Intellectual snob to join. Pseudo-intellectuals are also welcome. All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony and some baffling intellectual ideas or--dare I say it--some unanswered question you wish to convey incognito.

The premise = to share your intellectual baffling snob idea or question on a name tag (provided) and attach such tag to your shirt, OR chuck such idea or question in a basket in our midst which will be provided and passed around (please pass it around!).

Once this deed is done, pluck from the basket & discuss, if appropriate. This may lead to much laughter, but others may be baffled & perhaps enlightened.

Humor in good taste: ALLOWED. Intellectual apparel: allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, periwig, or monocle. Fold-up sunglasses, corduroy jackets w/ elbow patches: allowed. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes please. Absinthe is not served.

Please bring cash.

When settling the bill, make sure and add 25% of what you are spending for tax and gratuity!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the LOWER patio in front of the main entrance of the Charles Hotel
item.name: Intellectual Snob Meetup Chap XVIII-- The Machines
